post.summary: Allows to submit an XML DUIS Body element to the adaptor.
post.description: Allows to submit DUIS requests to the DCC gateway providing a set of inputs to specify the header and the XML DUIS Body element.

200.description: Success. The request was successfully processed, submitted to DCC Gateway and an HTTP response was received.

400.description: Error. At least one validation failed.

405.description: Error. An invalid method was used. Only POST is allowed.

415.description: Error. The request was submitted with an unsupported media type value.

500.description: Error. Unable to finish processing the request.

year.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/Year. Either the specified value of the year, null for a non specified year, or the year() placeholder (e.g., ${year()} or ${year(offset)})

month.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/Month. Either the specified value of the month, null for a non specified month, or the month() placeholder (e.g., ${month()} or ${month(offset)})

dayOfMonth.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/DayOfMonth. Either the specified value of the day-of-month, null for a non specified day-of-month, -1 for the last-day-of-month, -2 for second-last-day-of-month, or the dayOfMonth() placeholder (e.g., ${dayOfMonth()} or ${dayOfMonth(offset)})

dayOfWeek.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/DayOfWeek. Either the specified value of the day-of-week, null for a non specified day-of-week, or the dayOfWeek() placeholder (e.g., ${dayOfWeek()} or ${dayOfWeek(offset)})

eui64.description: EUI-64 of the user that submitted the request.

allOf.description: Service Reference Variant value of the request.
Report object that contains the details on whether the SRV is critical and the number of requests for each timePeriod configured according to the ADT processing.

criticalSrv.description: Whether the SRV is critical or not.

thresholdResults.description: Array of results of the ADT threshold validation that contains the rules configured for the referred eui64 and srv, and for each the numberOfRequests recorded for said timePeriod.

timePeriod.description: Time period value (in minutes) as it was configured in ADT Configuration for the EUI64 and SRV.

numberOfRequests.description: Number of requests recorded for the referred EUI64 and SRV that were submitted according to ADT processing for the timePeriod referred.

adtThresholdValue.description: ADT threshold value as it was configured in ADT Configuration for the EUI64 and SRV.

year.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/Year. Either the specified value of the year, null for a non specified year, or the year() placeholder (e.g., ${year()} or ${year(offset)})

month.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/Month. Either the specified value of the month, null for a non specified month, or the month() placeholder (e.g., ${month()} or ${month(offset)})

dayOfMonth.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/DayOfMonth. Either the specified value of the day-of-month, null for a non specified day-of-month, -1 for the last-day-of-month, -2 for second-last-day-of-month, or the dayOfMonth() placeholder (e.g., ${dayOfMonth()} or ${dayOfMonth(offset)})

dayOfWeek.description: A field for the element at sr:Date/DayOfWeek. Either the specified value of the day-of-week, null for a non specified day-of-week, or the dayOfWeek() placeholder (e.g., ${dayOfWeek()} or ${dayOfWeek(offset)})

enum: No Fault Return (SM WAN variant replacement requested by DCC)
No Fault Return (dual supplier HAN variant replacement)

transformDuisRequest.description: DUIS Request (in base64) that was provided to transform web service.

transformDuisResponse.description: DUIS Response (in base64) that contains the PreCommand that was received form the transform web service.

allOf.description: Contains the result of the Correlate service (from P&C).

errorMessages.description: CorrelateResult error messages. This is only present if the correlation has failed.

duisResponse.description: DUIS Response XML content (in base64) that the Signature validation was applied to.

allOf.description: Certificate object that contains the details of the certificate used to validate the DSP Signature.

originatorName.description: Service User name, as specified in the Service User configuration API.

target.description: Identifier of the target of the DUIS Request.

originatorCounter.description: Originator counter. If the values is not provided, the adaptor will generate a time-based originator counter.

allOf.description: Service Reference. For valid values refer to DUIS.
Service Reference Variant. For valid values refer to DUIS.

firstInSequence.description: Whether the Request is the first in a sequence. This corresponds to the DUIS element FirstInSequence.

precedingServiceRequestId.description: The RequestID of a preceding request when this particular request is intended to be executed in a sequence. This corresponds to the DUIS element PrecedingServiceRequestID.

code.description: Error code value returned by the P&C tool (only applicable if it failed).

message.description: Error message value returned by the P&C tool (only applicable if it failed).

suspendDebtDisabled.description: A field for the element at sr:UpdatePaymentMode/Prepayment/SuspendDebtDisabled.

suspendDebtEmergency.description: A field for the element at sr:UpdatePaymentMode/Prepayment/SuspendDebtEmergency.

disablementThreshold.description: A field for the element at sr:UpdatePaymentMode/Prepayment/DisablementThreshold.

duisRequest.description: DUIS Request XML content in base64 that was submitted to the DCC Gateway.

requestId.description: This is the value of the element RequestID from the DUIS Request.

signedPreCommand.description: For SMETS2 Critical requests, the second submission to the DCC Gateway will contain the SignedPreCommand value.

allOf.description: The DUIS schema version. Valid values: 1.0, 2.0, 3.0, 3.1, 4.0
This element contains the inputs for the DUIS Header.

bodyXml.description: This contains the XML element within the DUIS Body element (in base64).

allOf.description: The result status of the request submission.
The timestamp of the API call.
The Universally Unique Identifier (UUID) of the API request.

errorCode.description: Error code. Only present if an error occurred.

errorMessage.description: Message with the description of the error.

allOf.description: ADT Report object. It contains details on the ADT threshold validation. Only present if ADT validation is applied.
TAF Schema Validation Report object. It contains details on the XML Body content validation against the DUIS schema.
Transform Request object. It contains the DUIS Request that is sent to the transform web service to be transformed into GBCS payload. Only applicable to SMTS2 Critical requests.
Transform Response object. It contains the synchronous DUIS Response received from transform web service containing the GBCS payload (PreCommand). Only applicable to SMTS2 Critical requests.
Correlate Report object. Contains the result of the Correlate (from P&C) of the transformRequest and the transformResponse. Only applicable to SMTS2 Critical requests.
Request object. It contains the DUIS Request that is sent to the DCC.
Response object. It contains the synchronous response from DCC Gateway to the request message.

dspHttpStatusCode.description: HTTP status code from the DCC Gateway response.

duisResponse.description: DUIS Response XML content in base64 that was received from the DCC Gateway.

requestId.description: This is the value of the element RequestID from the DUIS Response.
